Method Detail

startExam

ExamineeSession startExam(java.lang.String hallTicketNumber,
                          java.lang.Long examId,
                          java.lang.Long subExamId)
                          throws ExamException
Starts the exam for a candidate by creating a new session and putting into cache. If a candidate session already exists fetch it from cache and use the same

Parameters:
hallTicketNumber - hall ticket number of the candidate
examId - id of the examination
subExamId - id of the sub-examination
Returns:
an object of type ExamineeSession
Throws:
{@link - ExamException}
ExamException

getOngoingExamSessions

java.util.Collection<ExamineeSession> getOngoingExamSessions()
provides all exam sessions for all the candidates who have started the exam but are yet to complete

Returns:
collection of ExamineeSession objects corresponding to all ongoing examinations

isExamInProgress

boolean isExamInProgress(java.lang.String hallTicketNumber)
Checks whether a candidate is giving an exam or not
